title: Gonna get flamed in game for not using a certain champion or not using PROJECT Skin.
body:
Good Job Riot. Gold Star on that idea.

For those of you not in the know there are PROJECT themed minions coming - but only if enough people use PROJECT skins will you be able to get the full, glorious, revolutionary experience! I sure will enjoy getting roasted in game for playing the champions I want to play or playing those with the skins but god forbid might want to use ones I like AND HAVE ALREADY PAID FOR.

Doggie want a biscuit? _Doggie want a biscuit?_

Roll over once in a while. -_-

replies.body:
Are you seriously crying over something that hasn't happened, but you assume will?

That is a whole new level of being a whiny little bi tch.

> [{quoted}](name=DianasGotSwag,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=6v4hAsEq,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-08-25T07:28:42.990+0000)
>
> Good Job Riot. Gold Star on that idea.
> 
> For those of you not in the know there are PROJECT themed minions coming - but only if enough people use PROJECT skins will you be able to get the full, glorious, revolutionary experience! I sure will enjoy getting roasted in game for playing the champions I want to play or playing those with the skins but god forbid might want to use ones I like AND HAVE ALREADY PAID FOR.
> 
> Doggie want a biscuit? _Doggie want a biscuit?_
> 
> Roll over once in a while. -_-

Not really...
do people really care that much about what minions look like?
Heh opposite thing happened to me, i wont do names but there was someone who flamed me all game for not buying High Noon Yasuo and shittalked me for using PROJECT: Yasuo.
